name: Revenga Entertainment
tag_list: games, mobile, movies, tv-series, unity3d, ipad, iphone, android
overview:
Revenga Entertainment will make you an adventurer, a hero!

Main words was said on PS4 presentation via Quantic Dream: «We are now in a such moment of entertainment history when games and movies can collapse atlast into something new. New generation of entertainment!»

Our interactive series technology (iSeries) will let you to live through hours of gameplay back to back with celebs and your facebook friends.

Episodes will be “filmed” using motion capture/face capture tech and we are looking forward to see 3d scanned for ex. Tom Cruise and Morgan Freeman playing their roles back 2 back with our Facebook-signed-in players on their iPad/iPhone/PS4/Android.

iSeries technology is based on Unity3d framework. Now we are developing special file format of interactive series for rapid delivery over 3G/Wi-Fi. Also special basic rendering, lighting & camerawork toolset has to be developed as a Plug-in for Unity3d IDE.
